Specimen Type: Peripheral blood (preferred) or saliva/buccal swab/extracted DNA
Purpose: Comprehensive sequencing of the CDKN1C gene to detect and interpret genetic variants of clinical significance.
Container: EDTA tube (for blood); appropriate collection kit for saliva/buccal swab
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, DNA sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), qPCR machine, gel electrophoresis apparatus, automated Sanger sequencer (e.g., ABI 3730)
